oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War cannon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Confederate Park; Downtown; military; portraits; Civil War; cannons; 1910s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men standing next to cannon in Confederate Park, Memphis. -- Text on back: 3 of Park Field's boys -- Sept 21, 1918.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo, 5.5 in. x 3.25 in.
